author: jdcasey
msg: o Added some more cleanup gunk.

author: jdcasey
msg: o Added to allow maven-plugin-loaders/maven-marmalade-loader to build.

author: jdcasey
msg: o Added setMojos(List) and setDependencies(List), each of which make defensive copies of the lists, to support non-xstream component-set-descriptor generation (esp. for script-based mojos).
o This will support the marmalade-plugin loader.

author: jdcasey
msg: o Added http://repository.codehaus.org alongside http://www.ibiblio.org/maven for latest updates (for now)...

author: jdcasey
msg: o Added check for null MojoDescriptor in the lifecycle context (throws GoalNotFoundException if == null)
